files.patch:
@@ -430,3 +430,5 @@ -

Sets the -testThreadFactory for JTReg. The source code -of all plugins is located in `test/jtreg_test_thread_factory/'. The -plugins are built as a part of test image.

+

Sets the -testThreadFactory for JTReg. Is should be the +name of class implementing ThreadFactory and located in +test/jtreg_test_thread_factory/'. The plugins are built as a part of test image. Currently, the onlyVirtual` +factory which executes test method main in virtual thread is +implmented.

@@ -383,2 +383,3 @@
-Sets the `-testThreadFactory` for JTReg. The source code of all plugins is located
-in `test/jtreg_test_thread_factory/'. The plugins are built as a part of test image.
+Sets the `-testThreadFactory` for JTReg. Is should be the name of class implementing ThreadFactory
+and located in `test/jtreg_test_thread_factory/'. The plugins are built as a part of test image.
+Currently, the only `Virtual` factory which executes test method main in virtual thread is implmented.
